title: Young Einstein
creator_credit: Yahoo Serious, David Roach, Warwick Ross and Serious Productions
brief_description: A classic Aussie comedy based on the premise that Albert Einstein not only developed the theory of relativity but also invented rock `n’ roll.

constellations_other.name: Great southern land?
constellations_other.description: Australia is often mythologised in film and TV, but national myths must not only be embraced, but resisted.

creator_credit_for_label: Yahoo Serious, David Roach, Warwick Ross and Serious Productions
description: A comedy based on the premise that Albert Einstein not only developed the theory of relativity but also invented rock `n’ roll. Albert Einstein sails the world, falls in love with the world’s most intelligent and beautiful girl, Marie Curie, creates the first surfboard, invents the electric guitar and uses rock’n’roll to save the planet from atomic destruction. Virtually a one-man tour de force by Yahoo Serious and co-starring Odile le Clezio, John Howard, Peewee Wilson, Su Cruickshank.
